short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captain America Wallpaper turn new tab to Captain America background. Custom Captain America wallpaper theme for Marvel fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically rotate Captain America wallpapers every time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize the Captain America background from the selection panel or set it as a favorite.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Note feature to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient bookmark access.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access favorite websites quickly.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Access to additional themes.
12. Options for easy social media sharing.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the new tab.
14. One-click access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, leaves, and fireworks on the Captain America tab.
